entries: You serve a living god who rules upon the face of Golarion, and this gives your actions a divine mandate not to be trifled with.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Intimidation} skill and the {@skill Lore||Razmir Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Group Coercion} skill feat.
